column1:
share on x jw jane walker. jun 19 at 3:28 pm many memories of her. she had the best smile. when we lived on hwy 40 the family was there. don't know what we were celebrating but jeanne & jerry showed us their dance moves. music on the radio & they were dancing in our big garage. thinking of everyone. hugs to all. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dk debbie kuntz. jun 19 at 1:51 pm our family historian.... between aunt jeanne and my mom.... they had it covered for all of us. many, many good memories of all the brothers and sisters together...... and they are together again, the ones that have passed. aunt phy keeping everyone in line. hugs to doug, dana & jodi. debbie. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x lauren roszell. jun 19 at 1:26 pm lit a candle in memory of carol "jeanne" frazier. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 22. 4:00 pm - 7:00 pm erlewein mortuary-greenfield1484 west us highway 40. greenfield, in, us, 46140. get funeral service. jun 22. 7:00 pm erlewein mortuary-greenfield1484 west us highway 40. greenfield, in, us, 46140. get wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe erlewein mortuary website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about
